sentences.en: A conical or heart - shaped green fruit with edible, sweet, white flesh.
sentences.cn: 一种圆锥形或心形绿色果实,可食用,果肉白色, 味甘甜.

sentences.en: A method of determining retinol acetate in edible oil was established.
sentences.cn: 建立了一种测定食用油中醋酸视黄酯的检测方法.

sentences.en: North American hickory having loose gray shaggy bark and edible nuts.
sentences.cn: 北美山胡桃树,有蓬松的灰色的表面粗糙的树皮和可食用的果儿.

sentences.en: One blast should be enough to make Caucasian food edible.
sentences.cn: 只需一下,就足够让白人的食品变得可食用了.

sentences.en: Peel off the blackened skin, flatten the pepper out and trim it into edible pieces.
sentences.cn: 把发黑的皮削掉，把甜椒压扁，切成可以入口的小块。

sentences.en: Resin method is adopted to extract edible pigment from waste undecanted wine.
sentences.cn: 采用树脂法从酒精废醪中提取食用色素.

sentences.en: Some mushrooms are edible; some are poisonous.
sentences.cn: 有些蘑菇可食用; 有些则有毒.

sentences.en: Take some edible food when you go there.
Textiles, Soaps, Medical Products, Beauty Products, Edible Oils Textiles.
sentences.cn: 采购产品纺织, 肥皂, 医药产品, 美容产品, 食用油纺织品.

sentences.en: The food at the hotel was barely edible.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆的食物简直不能入口。

sentences.en: These berries are edible, but those are poisonous.
sentences.cn: 这些浆果可以吃，但那些有毒。

sentences.en: This kind of mushroom is edible, but that kind is not.
sentences.cn: 这种蘑菇吃得, 那种吃不得.

sentences.en: Warm Tips: Do not squeeze, puncture and bulge bag, please not edible.
sentences.cn: 温馨提示: 勿挤压, 扎破、胀袋 、 漏气勿食用.

sentences.en: Why can it appear in the babies and infants edible powdered milk?
sentences.cn: 它为何能够出现于婴幼儿食用的奶粉?

sentences.en: You said SOME flowers are edible. What about ones that aren't?
sentences.cn: 你说有些花不可以食用. 那些不能食用的花是什么原因 呢 ?

trans.tran_en: something that is edible can be eaten
